name: Duplicitous Vampire
description:
Welcome to this small city. You live in a alley in a hidden crypt with your coffin as your ally for sleep and the nights are good with people wondering around on the main street just ready to give up their blood

The humans have used some sort of magic to reduce the length of the nights use your gathered blood to increase the time needed or to boost your own health / movement speed the choices are yours. Will you stalk the people that are in the plenty on the main road or find people hiding away in alleys.

?

WASD to move  or game pad d pad

space bar to move chat along

enter to select item/ button press.
